stories.text:
Hello Sysadmins , I'm looking for a DLP , probably a web based one in this case I guess .. that could just block noncompliant devices from downloading Zoho email attachments when browsing through web client.

Our organization has Azure AD Premium and has a scale size of 10 devices for now .

Thanks
stories.title: Any DLP that blocks Non Compliant Devices from downloading email attatchments?

stories.text: I have a 2010 Mac mini which I used to use for streaming but it has been retired over Christmas. It's a bit slower video wise so while I could use it for Linux I have other HW. It will probably end up in a cupboard but what other options are there for it? What do HN folks do with their retired hardware?
stories.title: Ask HN: What do you do with your older hardware?
